Game Modules

The following game modules have been released for general use, however these games may still require playtesting and may be seeking additional contributors.

Module Description
Respawn Respawn is a tabletop team skirmish game, requiring only 3 miniatures per player, with influences from popular online FPS games. Each team competes in Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, and King of the Hill type missions, with characters respawning each round to continue the fight.
Scraplands Showdown Scraplands Showdown is a post-apocalyptic vehicle racing and combat game. Each player assembles a team of cars, customised with upgrades, weapons, and armour, and competes to out-race and out-fight their opponents in a brutal Showdown.
Squadrons Squadrons is a game of high speed. intense combat encounters between small fighter or bomber scale ships.

Get Involved

Cadence is a Community owned project, you can find the source files for the rules and modules on Github. Find out more about it at the About Cadence page.
